# Facebook & Instagram Manager - Forms

## Content Generation Templates

### Facebook Post Template

```markdown
---
type: facebook_post
source: facebook-instagram-manager
platforms: [Facebook]
priority: medium
status: pending
created: 2026-01-11T18:00:00Z
---

# Facebook Post: [Title]

## Hook
[Compelling opening line to grab attention]

## Content
[Main message - 100-300 characters with relevant hashtags]

## Call to Action
[What do you want the reader to do?]

---
*Generated by Facebook & Instagram Manager*
```

### Instagram Post Template

```markdown
---
type: instagram_post
source: facebook-instagram-manager
platforms: [Instagram]
priority: high
status: pending
created: 202y-01-11T18:00:00Z
---

# Instagram Post: [Title or Hook]

## Content
[Visual-first content - short and engaging]

## Call to Action
[Link in bio for more details]

## Hashtags
[10-30 relevant hashtags]

---
*Generated by Facebook & Instagram Manager*
```

## Approval Workflow Template

### For Facebook Posts

```markdown
---
type: facebook_post
source: facebook-instagram-manager
platforms: [Facebook]
priority: medium
status: pending_approval
created: 2026-01-11T18:00:00Z
---

# Facebook Post: [Title]

## Post Content
[Your post content here]

## Approval Required
This post requires human review before posting.

## To Approve
1. Review the content
2. Edit if necessary
3. Move this file to /Approved/
4. The meta_approval_monitor will handle posting

## To Reject
Move this file to /Rejected/

---
*Generated by Facebook & Instagram Manager*
```

### For Instagram Posts

```markdown
---
type: instagram_post
source: facebook-instagram-manager
platforms: [Instagram]
priority: high
status: pending_approval
created: 2026-01-11T18:00:00Z
---

# Instagram Post: [Title/Hook]

## Content
[Your post content]

## Media Attachment
/path/to/image.jpg

## Approval Required
This post requires human review before posting.

## To Approve
1. Review the content and media
2. Edit if necessary
3. Move this file to /Approved/
4. The meta_approval_monitor will handle posting

## To Reject
Move this file to /Rejected/

---
*Generated by Facebook & Instagram Manager*
```

## Platform-Specific Guidelines

### Facebook Content Guidelines

**Length**: 100-300 characters (longer is okay for Facebook)

**Tone**: Professional, informative, value-driven

**Hashtags**: 3-5 relevant hashtags (not over-tagging)

**Links**: Fully qualified URLs work best

**Engagement**: Ask questions to encourage comments

**Timing**: Best times: 9-10 AM, 2-3 PM, 7-8 PM

**Frequency**: 2-3 posts per day max (avoid spam)

### Instagram Content Guidelines

**Length**: 50-150 characters (short is better)

**Tone**: Casual, visual-first, authentic, behind-the-scenes

**Hashtags**: 10-30 hashtags (Instagram allows more)

**Emojis**: Heavy emoji usage encouraged

**Links**: Use "Link in bio" approach (no clickable links in posts)

**Visuals**: All posts should have images or video

**Stories**: Post 3-5 stories daily for engagement

**Engagement**: Use story stickers, polls, questions

## Keyword-Based Triggers

The manager will generate content for these keywords:
- "promote" - Product/service promotion
- "launch" - New feature announcement
- "announcement" - General company update
- "behind scenes" - Behind-the-scenes content
- "testimonial" - Client success stories
- "tips" - Industry tips and advice
- "news" - Company news

## Approval File Naming Convention

**Facebook posts**: `FACEBOOK_POST_[timestamp].md`

**Instagram posts**: `INSTAGRAM_POST_[timestamp].md`

**Multi-platform**: `META_POST_[timestamp].md`

Where timestamp is: `YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS`
